sqlMap.insert: /* CmmDAO. */ INSERT INTO CT7000M( BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , ORG_FILE_NAME , REG_FILE_NAME , FILE_KEY , REG_NAME , REG_DATE )VALUES( #boardNo# , #boardType# , #orgFileName# , #regFileName# , #fileKey# , #regName# , #regDate# )
sqlMap.select:
/* CmmDAO.selectAttachOne */
SELECT ATTACH_NO AS attachNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , BOARD_TYPE AS boardType , ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName , REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName , FILE_KEY AS fileKey , REG_DATE AS regDate FROM CT7000M WHERE ATTACH_NO = #fileId#

/* CmmDAO.selectAttachList */
SELECT ATTACH_NO AS attachNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , BOARD_TYPE AS boardType , ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName , REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName , FILE_KEY AS fileKey , REG_DATE AS regDate FROM CT7000M WHERE BOARD_NO = #boardSeq# AND BOARD_TYPE = #boardType#

/* CmmDAO.selectAttachListFileKey */
SELECT ATTACH_NO AS attachNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , BOARD_TYPE AS boardType , ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName , REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName , FILE_KEY AS fileKey FROM CT7000M WHERE BOARD_NO = #boardSeq# AND BOARD_TYPE = #boardType# AND FILE_KEY = #fileKey#

/* CmmDAO.selectAttachListFileKeyOne */
SELECT ATTACH_NO AS attachNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , BOARD_TYPE AS boardType , ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName , REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName , FILE_KEY AS fileKey FROM CT7000M WHERE BOARD_NO = #boardSeq# AND BOARD_TYPE = #boardType# AND FILE_KEY = #fileKey#

/* CmmDAO.selectFileMerge */
SELECT A.ATTACH_NO AS attachNo ,A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo ,A.BOARD_TYPE AS boardType ,A.ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName ,A.REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName ,A.FILE_KEY AS fileKey ,B.RS_NO AS rsNo ,B.RSI_NO AS rsiNo FROM CT7000M A INNER JOIN RS2010M B ON A.BOARD_NO = CONCAT(LOWER(B.CORP_CD),B.RS_NO,B.RSI_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN SB1000M C ON C.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND C.RSJ_NO = B.RSJ_NO INNER JOIN CR2110M D ON D.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND D.TEMP_NO = A.FILE_KEY WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = #boardType# AND B.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND B.RSI_NO = #rsiNo# ORDER BY D.SV_SEQ

/* CmmDAO.selectFileMergeAllRsi */
SELECT A.ATTACH_NO AS attachNo ,A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo ,A.BOARD_TYPE AS boardType ,A.ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName ,A.REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName ,A.FILE_KEY AS fileKey ,B.RS_NO AS rsNo ,B.RSI_NO AS rsiNo FROM CT7000M A INNER JOIN RS2010M B ON A.BOARD_NO = CONCAT(LOWER(B.CORP_CD),B.RS_NO,B.RSI_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN SB1000M C ON C.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND C.RSJ_NO = B.RSJ_NO INNER JOIN CR2110M D ON D.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND D.TEMP_NO = A.FILE_KEY WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = #boardType# AND B.RS_NO = #rsNo# ORDER BY D.SV_SEQ

/* CmmDAO.selectFileMergeAllRsiList */
SELECT A.RSI_NO AS fileKey FROM RS2010M A WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# ORDER BY A.RSI_NO

/* CmmDAO.selectFileMergeRsNo */
SELECT A.ATTACH_NO AS attachNo ,A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo ,A.BOARD_TYPE AS boardType ,A.ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName ,A.REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName ,A.FILE_KEY AS fileKey ,B.RS_NO AS rsNo ,B.RSI_NO AS rsiNo FROM CT7000M A INNER JOIN RS2010M B ON A.BOARD_NO = CONCAT(LOWER(B.CORP_CD),B.RS_NO,B.RSI_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN SB1000M C ON C.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND C.RSJ_NO = B.RSJ_NO INNER JOIN CR2110M D ON D.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND D.TEMP_NO = A.FILE_KEY WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = #boardType# AND B.RS_NO = #rsNo# ORDER BY B.RSI_NO3, A.BOARD_NO, D.SV_SEQ

/* CmmDAO.selectFileMergeRsNo2 */
SELECT A.ATTACH_NO AS attachNo ,A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo ,A.BOARD_TYPE AS boardType ,A.ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName ,A.REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName ,A.FILE_KEY AS fileKey ,B.RS_NO AS rsNo ,B.RSI_NO AS rsiNo FROM CT7000M A INNER JOIN RS2010M B ON A.BOARD_NO = CONCAT(LOWER(B.CORP_CD),B.RS_NO,B.RSI_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = 'SVYMerge' AND B.RS_NO = #rsNo# ORDER BY B.RSI_NO3, A.BOARD_NO

/* CmmDAO.selectAttachListCnt */
SELECT count(*) FROM CT7000M WHERE BOARD_NO = #boardSeq#
sqlMap.delete: /* CmmDAO.deleteAttachFile */ DELETE FROM CT7000M WHERE ATTACH_NO = #attachSeq#
sqlMap.select:
/* CmmDAO.selectBranchList */
SELECT BRANCH_CD as branchCd ,BRANCH_NAME as branchName FROM CT1020M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BRANCH_NAME ASC

/* CmmDAO.selectBranchListOne */
SELECT BRANCH_CD as branchCd ,BRANCH_NAME as branchName FROM CT1020M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND BRANCH_CD = #branchCd# AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BRANCH_NAME ASC

/* CmmDAO.selectCmmCdList */
SELECT CD as cd ,CD_NAME as cdName FROM CM4000M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND CD_CLS = #cdCls# AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DSP_SEQ ASC , CD ASC

/* CmmDAO.selectStaffList */
SELECT A.EMP_No as empNo , A.EMP_NAME as empName , A.BRANCH_CD as branchCd , B.BRANCH_NAME as branchName , A.ORG_NO as orgNo , J.CD_NAME as orgName FROM CT1030M A INNER JOIN CT1020M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.BRANCH_CD = A.BRANCH_CD INNER JOIN CM4000M J ON J.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND J.CD_CLS = 'CM1220' AND J.CLS_CAT = '3' AND J.CD = A.ORG_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# ORDER BY empNo
sqlMap.insert:
/* CmmDAO.insertLoginLog */
INSERT INTO CT1040M( CORP_CD , BRANCH_CD , USER_ID , EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , LOGIN_TYPE , ACCE_IP , ACCE_DT )VALUES( #corpCd# , #branchCd# , #loginId# , #empNo# , #name# , #loginType# , #acceIp# , GETDATE() )

/* CmmDAO.insertAdmLog */ INSERT CT1050M( CORP_CD , MB_CD , MB_NAME , LOG_CONT , ACCE_IP , BRANCH_CD , DATA_REGNT , DATA_REGDT , LOG_CLS )VALUES( #corpCd# , #mbCd# , #mbName# , #logCont# , #acceIp# , #branchCd# , #dataRegnt# , GETDATE() , #logCls# )
sqlMap.select:
/* CmmDAO.selectYearList */
SELECT SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.RS_STDT, 23),0,5) FROM RS1000M A GROUP BY SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.RS_STDT, 23),0,5) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.RS_STDT, 23),0,5) DESC

/* CmmDAO.selectCmmYearRsCdList */
SELECT A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.RS_CD AS rsCd , A.REG_DT AS regDt , A.RS_STDT AS rsStdt , A.RS_ENDT AS rsEndt FROM RS1000M A
ON N.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND N.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND N.BRANCH_CD = #branchCd#
WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DT, 23),0,5) = #searchYear# AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DT, A.RS_CD

/* CmmDAO.selectCmmYearRsCdList2 */
SELECT A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.RS_CD AS rsCd , A.REG_DT AS regDt , A.RS_STDT AS rsStdt , A.RS_ENDT AS rsEndt FROM RS1010M A
ON N.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND N.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND N.BRANCH_CD = #branchCd#
WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DT, 23),0,5) = #searchYear# AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DT, A.RS_CD

/* CmmDAO.selectRsControlCnt */
SELECT count(*) FROM RS1030M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND EMP_NO = #empNo#

/* CmmDAO.selectRsControlCnt2 */
SELECT count(*) FROM RS1030M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO LIKE CONCAT(#rsNo#,'%') AND EMP_NO = #empNo#

/* CmmDAO.selectRsDelControlCnt */
SELECT count(*) FROM RS1000M A INNER JOIN RS2000M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* CmmDAO.selectMailHost */
SELECT TOP 1 STUFF((SELECT ',' + VAR1 FROM CT1080M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND CLS1 = 'MAIL' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS mailhost FROM CT1080M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND CLS1 = 'MAIL'

/* CmmDAO.selectMailSplList */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.EMAILT_NO AS emailtNo , A.TITLE AS title , A.CONT AS cont FROM RM1010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# ORDER BY A.EMAILT_NO

/* CmmDAO.selectSmsSplList */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , SMST_NO AS smstNo , CONT AS cont FROM RM2010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# ORDER BY A.SMST_NO
sqlMap.insert:
DECLARE @R_CORP_CD NVARCHAR(0008) = #corpCd# DECLARE @V_RECM_DT NVARCHAR(0010) = #recmDt# DECLARE @P_RTN_KEY NVARCHAR(0020) DECLARE @BDT04 NVARCHAR(0004) DECLARE @BDT06 NVARCHAR(0006) DECLARE @BDT10 NVARCHAR(0010) SET @BDT10 = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 23) SET @BDT04 = SUBSTRING(@V_RECM_DT, 1, 4) SET @BDT06 = SUBSTRING(DBO.UFN_DTG08(@BDT10), 1, 6)
SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), ISNULL(MAX(A.RECM_NO), @BDT04 + '0000')) + 1) as recmNo FROM RM1000M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = @R_CORP_CD AND SUBSTRING(A.RECM_DT, 1, 4) = @BDT04
/* CmmDAO.insertAjaxSaveMail */
INSERT RM1000M( CORP_CD , RECM_NO , RECM_DT , BRANCH_CD , RS_NO , TSTA_CLS , TSEN_CLS , SEND_NO , SEND_NAME , RECE_NO , RECE_NAME , SEND_EMAIL , RECE_EMAIL , SENDS_CLS , SENDM_CLS , TITLE , CONT , REMK , RESR_DT , RESR_HR , RESR_MM , ACCP_DT , SEND_DT , RETN_DT , FILE_NAMES , OT_FILE_NAMES , EMAILS , SMSCONT , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #recmNo# , #recmDt# , #branchCd# , #rsNo# , #tstaCls# , #tsenCls# , #sendNo# , #sendName# , #receNo# , #receName# , #sendEmail# , #receEmail# , #sendsCls# , #sendmCls# , #title# , #cont# , #remk# , #resrDt# , #resrHr# , #resrMm# , GETDATE() , GETDATE() , #retnDt# , #fileNames# , #otFileNames# , #emails# , #smscont# , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# )
sqlMap.select:
/* CmmDAO.selectRsjDetail2 */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RSJ_NO AS rsjNo , A.RSJ_NAME AS rsjName , A.EMAIL AS email , A.HP_NO AS hpNo FROM SB1000M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RSJ_NO = #rsjNo#

/* CmmDAO.selectRecmNoDetail */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RECM_NO AS recmNo , A.RECM_DT AS recmDt , A.BRANCH_CD AS branchCd , F.BRANCH_NAME AS branchName , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , ISNULL(G.RS_NAME, '') AS rsName , A.TSTA_CLS AS tstaCls , H.CD_NAME AS tstaClsNm , A.TSEN_CLS AS tsenCls , ISNULL(I.CD_NAME, '') AS tsenClsNm , A.SEND_NO AS sendNo , A.SEND_NAME AS sendName , A.RECE_NO AS receNo , A.RECE_NAME AS receName , A.SEND_EMAIL AS sendEmail , A.RECE_EMAIL AS receEmail , A.SENDS_CLS AS sendsCls , J.CD_NAME AS sendsClsNm , A.SENDM_CLS AS sendmCls , K.CD_NAME AS sendmClsNm , A.TITLE AS title , A.CONT AS cont , A.REMK AS remk , A.RESR_DT AS resrDt , A.RESR_HR AS resrHr , A.RESR_MM AS resrMm , A.ACCP_DT AS accpDt , A.SEND_DT AS sendDt , A.RETN_DT AS retnDt , A.FILE_NAMES AS fileNames , A.OT_FILE_NAMES AS otFileNames , A.EMAILS AS emails , A.SMSCONT AS smscont , A.DATA_REGDT AS dataRegdt , A.DATA_REGNT AS dataRegnt FROM RM1000M A LEFT JOIN CT1020M F ON F.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND F.BRANCH_CD = A.BRANCH_CD LEFT JOIN RS1000M G ON G.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND G.RS_NO = A.RS_NO INNER JOIN CM4000M H ON H.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND H.CD_CLS = 'CM1310' AND H.CD = A.TSTA_CLS LEFT JOIN CM4000M I ON I.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND I.CD_CLS = 'CM1320' AND I.CD = A.TSEN_CLS INNER JOIN CM4000M J ON J.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND J.CD_CLS = 'CM1330' AND J.CD = A.SENDS_CLS INNER JOIN CM4000M K ON K.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND K.CD_CLS = 'CM1340' AND K.CD = A.SENDM_CLS WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RECM_NO = #recmNo#
sqlMap.insert:
DECLARE @R_CORP_CD NVARCHAR(0008) = #corpCd# DECLARE @V_RECM_DT NVARCHAR(0010) = #recmDt# DECLARE @P_RTN_KEY NVARCHAR(0020) DECLARE @BDT04 NVARCHAR(0004) DECLARE @BDT06 NVARCHAR(0006) DECLARE @BDT10 NVARCHAR(0010) SET @BDT10 = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 23) SET @BDT04 = SUBSTRING(@V_RECM_DT, 1, 4) SET @BDT06 = SUBSTRING(DBO.UFN_DTG08(@BDT10), 1, 6)
SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), ISNULL(MAX(A.RECM_NO), @BDT04 + '0000')) + 1) as recmNo FROM RM1020M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = @R_CORP_CD AND SUBSTRING(A.RECM_DT, 1, 4) = @BDT04
/* CmmDAO.insertResendMail */
INSERT RM1020M( CORP_CD , RECM_NO , RECM_DT , ORECM_NO , TSTA_CLS , TSEN_CLS , ACCP_DT , SEND_DT , RETN_DT , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #recmNo# , #recmDt# , #orecmNo# , #tstaCls# , #tsenCls# , GETDATE() , GETDATE() , #retnDt# , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# )
sqlMap.select:
/* CmmDAO.selectCmmRsList */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RS_NO1 AS rsNo1 , A.RS_NO2 AS rsNo2 , F.CD_NAME AS rsNo2Nm , A.RS_NO3 AS rsNo3 , G.CD_NAME AS rsNo3Nm , A.RS_NO4 AS rsNo4 , H.CD_NAME AS rsNo4Nm , A.RS_NO5 AS rsNo5 , A.RS_NO6 AS rsNo6 , A.RS_NO7 AS rsNo7 , A.RS_CD AS rsCd , A.REG_DT AS regDt , A.RS_DRT AS rsDrt , I.EMP_NAME AS rsDrtNm , A.RS_SCNT AS rsScnt , A.RS_MSCNT AS rsMscnt , A.RS_STDT AS rsStdt , A.RS_ENDT AS rsEndt , A.RSST_CLS AS rsstCls , J.CD_NAME AS rsstClsNm , A.REP_DT AS repDt , A.VISIT_CNT AS visitCnt , A.DUPL_YN AS duplYn , A.RS_POS AS rsPos , A.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.RS_PPS AS rsPps , A.RS_PTC AS rsPtc , A.VEND_NO AS vendNo , ISNULL(K.VEND_NAME, '') AS vendName , A.VMNG_NAME AS vmngName , A.VMNGHP_NO AS vmnghpNo , A.VMNG_EMAIL AS vmngEmail , A.RS_PAY AS rsPay , A.RS_PAYVT AS rsPayvt , A.IRBSM_YN AS irbsmYn , A.ITEM_CLS AS itemCls , L.CD_NAME AS itemClsNm , A.ITEM_NAME AS itemName , A.BRANCH_CD AS branchCd , A.DEL_YN AS delYn , A.DATA_LOCK_YN AS dataLockYn , A.ECRF_STATE AS ecrfState , A.DATA_REGDT AS dataRegdt , A.DATA_REGNT AS dataRegnt FROM RS1000M A INNER JOIN CM4000M F ON F.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND F.CD_CLS = 'CT2020' AND F.CLS_CAT = '3' AND F.CD = A.RS_NO2 INNER JOIN CM4000M G ON G.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND G.CD_CLS = 'CT2030' AND G.CLS_CAT = '3' AND G.CD = A.RS_NO3 INNER JOIN CM4000M H ON H.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND H.CD_CLS = 'CT2060' AND H.CLS_CAT = '3' AND H.CD = A.RS_NO4 INNER JOIN CT1030M I ON I.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND I.EMP_NO = A.RS_DRT INNER JOIN CM4000M J ON J.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND J.CD_CLS = 'CT2050' AND J.CLS_CAT = '3' AND J.CD = A.RSST_CLS LEFT JOIN CT2000M K ON K.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND K.VEND_NO = A.VEND_NO INNER JOIN CM4000M L ON L.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND L.CD_CLS = 'CT2040' AND L.CLS_CAT = '3' AND L.CD = A.ITEM_CLS
(A.CORP_CD = #corpCd#)
(A.RS_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%') OR A.RS_CD LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%') OR K.VEND_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%'))
AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NAME

/* CmmDAO.selectRsjDetail2 */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.RS_CD AS rsCd FROM RS1000M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* CmmDAO.selectRsInfoMst */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.RS_CD AS rsCd , A.RS_NO1 AS rsNo1 , A.RS_NO2 AS rsNo2 FROM RS1010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* CmmDAO.selectCmmRsProtocolList */
SELECT CD as cd ,CD_NAME as cdName FROM CM4000M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND CD_CLS = #cdCls# AND CD_DESC LIKE CONCAT('%',#type#,'%') AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CD_DESC , CD_NAME

/* CmmDAO.selectTempType */
SELECT CASE A.TEMP_TYPE WHEN '1030' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS chkTempType FROM CR2100M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.TEMP_NO = #tempNo#
